question: Pershing Square IPO in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Pershing Square USA completes an Initial Public Offering (IPO) by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, as confirmed by official company announcements or credible news sources. The IPO refers to the first sale of stock Pershing Square USA to the public on any recognized stock exchange.

If Pershing Square merges with another entity, is acquired, or ceases to exist before the market resolves, the market will also resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Bitcoin above $60,000 on September 6?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 06 Sep '24 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) has a final “Close” price of 60,000.01 or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: National Guard deployed to Aurora by next Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the US National Guard is deployed in Aurora, Colorado in response to gang activity between August 29 and September 6, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Only the actual deployment of the US National Guard (including the Colorado National Guard) will suffice for this market to resolve to "Yes"; an announcement of a future deployment alone will not qualify.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the government of the United States, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: National Guard deployed to Aurora by next Friday?
events.description:

question: Will Elon tweet less than 80 times?
description:
If Elon Musk (@elonmusk), posts less than 80 times on X between August 30, 2024, 12:00 PM ET (noon) and September 6, 2024, 12:00 PM ET this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, only main feed posts, quote posts and reposts posts will count.

Replies will NOT count towards the total - however, replies on the main feed such as https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1786073478711353576 will be counted by the tracker.

Deleted posts will count as long as they remain available long enough to be captured by the tracker (~5 minutes).

The resolution source for this market is the ‘Post Counter’ figure for posts found at https://www.xtracker.io/. Individual posts can be viewed by clicking "Export Data". If the tracker does not update correctly in accordance with the rules, X itself may be used as a secondary resolution source

events.title: Elon Musk # of tweets August 30-Sept 6?
events.description: Elon Musk # of tweets August 30-Sept 6?

question: Will Great Britain win the most medals in the 2024 Paralympics?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Great Britain wins more medals of all types than any other country at the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If this country ties with any other for the greatest number of medals won, this market will resolve in favor of the country which won the most gold medals. If this also results in a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the country whose registered name comes first in alphabetical order.

This market will resolve based on the medal figures as they stand after medals are awarded for the final event in the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games. Later changes to medal counts will not be considered toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source is the final medal table published by the International Paralympic Committee (IPC).

events.title: Most medals at 2024 Paralympics?
events.description: Most medals at 2024 Paris Paralympics.

If this country ties with any other for the greatest number of gold medals won, this market will resolve in favor of the country which won the most medals overall. If this also results in a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the country whose registered name comes first in alphabetical order.

This market will resolve based on the medal figures as they stand after medals are awarded for the final event in the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games. Later changes to medal counts will not be considered toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source is the final medal table published by the International Paralympic Committee (IPC).

events.title: Most gold medals at 2024 Paralympics?

question: Trump posts 15-19 times on X?
description:
If Donald Trump (@realDonaldTrump), posts between 15 (inclusive) and 19 (inclusive) times on X between August 30, 2024, 12:00 PM ET and September 6, 2024, 12:00 PM ET this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, only main feed posts, quote posts and reposts posts will count.

Replies will NOT count towards the total - however, replies on the main feed such as https://x.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1345967072006828033 will be counted by the tracker.

Deleted posts will count as long as they remain available long enough to be captured by the tracker (~5 minutes).

The resolution source for this market is the ‘Post Counter’ figure for posts found at https://www.xtracker.io/. Individual posts can be viewed by clicking "Export Data". If the tracker does not update correctly in accordance with the rules, X itself may be used as a secondary resolution source.

question: $BTC dips below $50k before October?
description:
This market will immediately resolve to “Yes” if any Binance 1 minute candle for Bitcoin BTC-USDT between 2024/08/30 10:00 and 2024/09/30 23:59 in the ET timezone has a final “Low” price of 49,999.99 or less. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC-USDT "Low" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with “1m” candles selected on the top bar.

To see the "Low" prices, mouse over particular candles and look at the value "Low" at the top of the chart.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC-USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will another country win the most gold medals at the 2024 Paralympics?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any country that is not USA, The People's Republic of China, Great Britain, Brazil, or the Netherlands wins more gold medals than any other country at the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If this country ties with any other for the greatest number of gold medals won, this market will resolve in favor of the country which won the most medals overall. If this also results in a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the country whose registered name comes first in alphabetical order.

This market will resolve based on the medal figures as they stand at after medals are awarded for the final event in the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games. Later changes to medal counts will not be considered toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source is the final medal table published by the International Paralympic Committee (IPC).

events.title: Most gold medals at 2024 Paralympics?
events.description: Most gold medals at the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games.

question: 2024 September hottest on record?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the data for the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for September 2024 shows an increase greater than that of any prior September when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

At the point the data for September 2024 is first released, it will be compared to all previous data points for September, and if 2024 September is higher than all previous data points, this market will resolve to "Yes".

Note: If 2024 September is tied for highest with another year, it will NOT suffice to resolve this market to "Yes" - it must be higher.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figures found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "Sep" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for September 2024 is provided by NASA by January 1, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, a consensus of credible sources will be used to resolve this market.

events.title: 2024 September hottest on record?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the data for the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for September 2024 shows an increase greater than that of any prior September when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

At the point the data for September 2024 is first released, it will be compared to all previous data points for September, and if 2024 September is higher than all previous data points, this market will resolve to "Yes".

Note: If 2024 September is tied for highest with another year, it will NOT suffice to resolve this market to "Yes" - it must be higher.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figures found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "Sep" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for September 2024 is provided by NASA by January 1, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, a consensus of credible sources will be used to resolve this market.

question: Will Liz Cheney endorse Kamala Harris?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if former US representative Liz Cheney announces that she will vote for, endorses, or otherwise supports Kamala Harris to be President of the United States between August 29 and November 4, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be statements or official information from Liz Cheney or one of her representatives.

events.title: Will Liz Cheney endorse Kamala Harris?
events.description:

The resolution source for this market will be statements or official information from Liz Cheney or one of her representatives.

question: Will another country win the most medals in the 2024 Paralympics?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any country that is not the U.S., The People's Republic of China, Great Britain, Brazil, France, Italy, Australia, or Ukraine wins more total medals than any other country at the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If there is a tie between countries for the greatest number of medals won, this market will resolve in favor of the country which won the most gold medals. If this also results in a tie, this market will resolve in favor of the country whose registered name comes first in alphabetical order.

This market will resolve based on the medal figures as they stand at after medals are awarded for the final event in the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games. Later changes to medal counts will not be considered toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source is the final medal table published by the International Paralympic Committee (IPC).

events.title: Most medals at 2024 Paralympics?
events.description: Most medals at 2024 Paris Paralympics.

question: Who will eat more Hot Dogs in 10 minutes?
description:
Joey Chestnut and Takeru Kobayashi are scheduled for a Hot Dog Eating Contest titled "Chestnut vs. Kobayashi: Unfinished Beef" in Las Vegas Nevada, streaming live on Netflix, on September 2, 2024.

This market will resolve to “Chestnut” if Joey Chestnut wins the Hot Dog Eating Contest between himself and Takeru Kobayashi. 

This market will resolve to “Kobayashi” if Takeru Kobayashi wins the Hot Dog Eating Contest between himself and Joey Chestnut.

The resolution will be based on the official declaration of the winner by the contest judges after tiebreakers, overtime, and deductions, have been considered. 

If the contest is canceled, postponed beyond September 9th, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from Netflix and contest organizers however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Chestnut vs. Kobayashi
events.description: This market group refers to the Hot Dog eating contest titled "Chestnut vs. Kobayashi: Unfinished Beef " between Joey Chesntnut and Takeru Kobayashi on September 2, 2024 in Las Vegas, Nevada streaming live on Netflix.

question: Will Joey Chestnut eat 65 or more Hot Dogs?
description:
Joey Chestnut and Takeru Kobayashi are scheduled for a Hot Dog Eating Contest titled "Chestnut vs. Kobayashi: Unfinished Beef" in Las Vegas Nevada, streaming live on Netflix, on September 2, 2024.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Joey Chestnut eats 65 or more Hot Dogs in the contest, otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution will be based on the official count of hot dogs and buns consumed by Joey Chestnut as recorded by the contest judges during the 10-minute competition period.

Penalties, which result in deductions from the final count, will be included.

Only hotdogs consumed during the initial 10-minute contest period will be considered for this market - consumption during tiebreakers or additional rounds will not counted towards the resolution.

If the contest is canceled or postponed beyond September 9th, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source will be official information from Netflix and contest organizers however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Brazil unban X before October?
description:
On August 30, 2024, Brazilian supreme court judge Alexandre de Moraes ordered that X/Twitter be suspended within Brazil effective immediately.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if this suspension is ordered to be lifted in full by September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An order made before the resolution date that the suspension be lifted will suffice to resolve this market to “Yes”, regardless of when the order goes into effect.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Brazilian government and X/Twitter, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Brazil unban X before October?
events.description:
On August 30, 2024, Brazilian supreme court judge Alexandre de Moraes ordered that X/Twitter be suspended within Brazil effective immediately.

An order made before the resolution date that the suspension be lifted will suffice to resolve this market to “Yes”, regardless of when the order goes into effect.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Brazilian government and X/Twitter, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Iran military response by Monday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Iran initiates a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, maritime territory or any official Israeli embassy or consulate between August 29 and September 2, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, maritime territory or any official Israeli embassy or consulate (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e. Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

events.title: Iran military response by Monday?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Iran initiates a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, maritime territory or any official Israeli embassy or consulate between August 29 and September 2, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, maritime territory or any official Israeli embassy or consulate (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e. Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

question: Another South American country bans X?
description:
On August 30, 2024, Brazilian supreme court judge Alexandre de Moraes ordered that X/Twitter be suspended within Brazil effective immediately.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if it is officially announced by the government of any South American country, excluding Brazil, that use of X/Twitter is banned within that country for the majority of its citizens between August 30 (inclusive) and September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

"Banned" is defined as a country's citizens being officially barred from downloading and/or viewing X/Twitter, and/or posting on X/Twitter.

An announcement or order of a ban made before the resolution date will suffice to resolve this market to “Yes”, regardless of when the ban goes into effect. The ban must be announced after this market's creation date (August 30) for it to count - previous bans will not be considered.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from relevant governments and X/Twitter, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Another South American country bans X?
events.description:
On August 30, 2024, Brazilian supreme court judge Alexandre de Moraes ordered that X/Twitter be suspended within Brazil effective immediately.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if it is officially announced by the government of any South American country, excluding Brazil, that use of X/Twitter is banned within that country for the majority of its citizens between August 30 (inclusive) and September 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

"Banned" is defined as a country's citizens being officially barred from downloading and/or viewing X/Twitter, and/or posting on X/Twitter.

An announcement or order of a ban made before the resolution date will suffice to resolve this market to “Yes”, regardless of when the ban goes into effect. The ban must be announced after this market's creation date (August 30) for it to count - previous bans will not be considered.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from relevant governments and X/Twitter, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Kamala mentions McDonald’s again before debate?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kamala Harris mentions the word "McDonald's" between August 30 and September 9, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word "McDonalds", "McDonald's" or "McDonald" which is recorded (audio or video) and publicly accessible.
-Any written usage of the word "McDonalds", "McDonald's" or "McDonald" published through Kamala's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization (@KamalaHarris and @VP, would qualify however @KamalaHQ will not count).

Videos posted on her social media which were filmed outside this market's time frame will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

-Any written usage of the word "McDonalds", "McDonald's" or "McDonald" published through Kamala's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization (@KamalaHarris and @VP, would qualify however @KamalaHQ will not count).
